name: The Taller I Grow
description:
A short game where you play as a square that can connect to other blocks and become taller, in order to complete puzzles. Made for the Extra Credits Game Jam #4.

How to Play
  • A/D or left/right arrow keys to move left/right
  • Space to jump
  • W to connect to blocks
  • S to disconnect
  • R to restart level
